local_intent: Execute a directional push on the cloth (0.2 m at 180 deg) with yaw maintained at 90, retry once if needed, and verify target visibility.
assumptions: Cloth has been located and is within reachable workspace
Contact has been established prior to push
End-effector yaw is intended to be 90 degrees for this push direction
coherence_with_global: Matches the transfer phase: aligns via orientation, performs the push with specified distance and direction, and performs a lightweight post-check; uses only library nodes and binned values, consistent with the global plan.
